title: Teapot And Cover
creditline: Gift of the C. Helme and Alice B. Strater Collection
description: White glass with slight blue cast with painted decoration.  Lid had red orange flower bud or fruit finial.  Large loss/chip on inner lip of lid

Teapot And Cover.
